name: KADILI-BOT
description: Best WhatsApp bot developed by Kadili TECH

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for your bot

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID, the code you received from Kadili TECH site

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Enter here the number that is hosting the bot Eg, 255xxxxxxx

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

AUTO_REPLY.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reply message when offline

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes to put your Kadili bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

ANTIDELETE.description: If you want to enable anti-delete message put yes else put no
